lead_paragraph: The police have arrested a former customer of the victim, a Hindu shoe store owner, but an account linked to Islamic militants claimed responsibility for the death.

byline.contributor: Ellen Barry contributed reporting from New Delhi.

headline.main: Bangladeshi Police Dismiss Claim That ISIS Was Behind Shop Owner’s Death

snippet: The police have arrested a former customer of the victim, a Hindu shoe store owner, but an account linked to Islamic militants claimed responsibility for the death.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
